articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Tactical Rocket Firing Drill of Units of KPA Strategic Force in Western Sector of Front
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Tactical Rocket Firing Drill of Units of KPA Strategic Force in Western Sector of Front
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, again provided field guidance to the tactical rocket firing drill of the units of the KPA Strategic Force in the western sector of the  front.
					 The drill was conducted as a combination of a sudden movement and firepower strike to assess and inspect the actual combat capabilities of the above-said units. 
					
					 He learned in detail about the firing plan worked out by the Staff of the Strategic Force, the designated flight orbit and the blockade of the targeted waters, etc. before giving an order to fire tactical rockets. 
					
					 The drill once again fully demonstrated the tactical rockets' high capability of hitting the targets and combat capability. This helped accurately define the order of combat actions and firepower missions of the strike units of the Strategic Force in the western sector of the front in case of emergency and round off the firing methods according to different enemy targets. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the drill was successfully staged in combination with rapid movement as required by a modern warfare. 
					
					 He gave important instructions for rounding off the combat preparations of the Strategic Force and applying the Juche-oriented rocket combat methods.
					
					 He said: "We should be prepared for both words and actions. However fair-minded and just we are, we may become a bargaining chip for the strong and our precious history inherited with blood will loose its shine in a moment if we are weak".
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the units of the Strategic Force would as ever further step up the combat readiness of rockets and always keep themselves ready to promptly fire them by undergoing drills under the simulated conditions of an actual battle and thus cope with the reckless confrontation hysteria of the enemies to stifle the DPRK by force at any cost with powerful military deterrent. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Pak Jong Chon, Yun Tong Hyon and Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Bier of Jon Pyong Ho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Expresses Condolences over Death of Jon Pyong Ho
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, paid a condolence call at the bier of Jon Pyong Ho to express sorrow at his death on Wednesday.
					 Placed before the bier was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also seen before the bier were wreathes in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK, Central Military Commission of the WPK, NDC of the DPRK, Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, DPRK Cabinet, Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and institutions.
					
					 Standing beside the bier were the honor guards of the KPA.
					
					 He paid a silent tribute to the memory of the deceased and went round the bier with sorrow for the death of a veteran revolutionary who had devoted himself to the work for glorifying the immortal revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in developing the national defense industry till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Kim Jong Un met the members of the bereaved family to express his sympathy with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, Hyon Yong Chol, Pak To Chun, Yun Tong Hyon, Jo Chun Ryong, Ju Kyu Chang and Choe Chun Sik.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Jon Pyong Ho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Jon Pyong Ho
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un Wednesday sent a wreath to the bier of Jon Pyong Ho, general of the Korean People's Army and honorary curator of the KPA Museum of Weapons and Equipment, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: DPRK Olympic Committee Sends Notice to Organizing Committee of 17th Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Olympic Committee Sends Notice to Organizing Committee of 17th Asian Games
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Olympic Committee of the DPRK sent a notice to the chairman of the organizing committee of the 17th Asian Games on Thursday.
					 The notice said that the DPRK, as it clarified in the statement of its government, decided to send a players group and a large cheering squad to the 17th Asian Games slated to take place in Inchon, south Korea in order to improve the inter-Korean relations, provide the atmosphere for national unity and cheer its players.
					
					 It said that the DPRK proposed to hold the north-south working-level talks of officials concerned either in the north's portion or in the south's portion of Panmunjom on around July 15 to discuss the issues arising in the DPRK players group's participation in the games and the dispatch of the cheering squad.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Brazilian Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Brazilian Ambassador
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong had a talk with Brazilian Ambassador to the DPRK Roberto Colin who paid a courtesy call on him on Thursday.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Mongolia
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Mongolia
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj, president of Mongolia, on the occasion of the 93rd anniversary of the victory of the people's revolution in Mongolia.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional and excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger by their joint positive efforts and wished the friendly Mongolian people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Mongolian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Mongolian PM
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Thursday sent a message of greeting to Noroviin Altankhuyag, prime minister of Mongolia, on the occasion of the 93rd anniversary of the victory of the people's revolution in Mongolia.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields, wishing the prime minister and the government of Mongolia greater success in their work for the development and prosperity of the country.
					
					 The DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to Mongolian Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade Luvsanvandan Bold on the same day.

articles.title: Japanese Dietmen's Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japanese Dietmen's Delegation Here
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A Japanese dietment's delegation headed by Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councilors, arrived here on Thursday.
					 The delegation consists of Members of the House of Representatives Kenta Matsunami, Takashi Ishizeki and Naoto Sakaguchi and Members of the House of Councilors Takayuki Shimizu and Taro Yamada who are dietmen from different political parties of Japan and members of the Sports Peace Community Association of Japan.

articles.title: Delegation of Oceania Remembrance Committee Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Oceania Remembrance Committee Leaves
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Oceania committee to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung and the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il led by Co-Secretary General Raymond Ferguson, national secretary of the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture, left here Thursday.

articles.title: Delegation of General Bureau of Software Industry of DPRK Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of General Bureau of Software Industry of DPRK Back Home
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the General Bureau of Software Industry of the DPRK headed by General Director Kang Yong Jun returned home on Thursday after visiting Mongolia.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of C.C., Communist Party of Russian Federation
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of C.C., Communist Party of Russian Federation
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message from G. Zhuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, on July 8.
					 The message said:
					
					 Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un
					
					 It is 20 years since Comrade Kim Il Sung, the great son of the Korean people, passed away.
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung was the founder of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and its armed forces.
					
					 He performed noble feats in building a modern state and achieving successes in all spheres of the life in the DPRK including industry, public health, science, education and sports.
					
					 He set forth historic proposals for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 Today the Korean people pay tribute to the leader through their heroic labor.
					
					 We are convinced that the people of the DPRK will continue successfully building the socialist society true to the behests of Comrade Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Please accept my regards.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Families of overseas Koreans related to the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung visited Mangyongdae, his birthplace.
					 Looking back on the revolutionary career of the President and his family members who devoted themselves to the country and its people, the overseas Koreans went round historic relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They visited revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 They also visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, Mirim Riding Club, Munsu Water Park, etc.

articles.title: AINDF Central Committee Backs Statement of DPRK Government
articles.content:
AINDF Central Committee Backs Statement of DPRK Government
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) issued a statement on July 8 in support of the statement of the DPRK government, according to the website of Kuguk Jonson.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Central Committee of the AINDF fully supports it which reflects the principled and practical measures for improving the inter-Korean ties and opening up a new turning phase for the independent reunification, considering that it fully conforms with the unanimous desire and wishes of the south Korean people.
					
					 The statement of the DPRK government to improve the relations with the south and provide a turning point of the national reconciliation and unity by defusing the tensions on the Korean peninsula is just a patriotic bold decision.
					
					 The people from all walks of life should turn out in the nationwide struggle to defend and implement the south-north joint agreements such as the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration in hearty response to the sincere and compatriotic statement to improve the relations with the south and open up a new phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 If the south Korean conservative authorities truly wish the south-north relations to be improved and the country to be reunified, there is no reason for them not to respond to the statement.
					
					 The AINDF will wage a more vigorous struggle to improve the inter-Korean ties together with all the people desirous of national reconciliation, unity, reunification and prosperity and thus open up a new phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity without fail.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Statues and Grave of Kim Hyong Jik
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Statues and Grave of Kim Hyong Jik
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the statue of Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter and an outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea, in Ponghwa-ri, Kangdong County, Pyongyang and before his grave in Mangyongdae on Thursday on the occasion of the 120th anniversary of his birth.
					 Seen standing before the statue and grave were wreaths from supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, the chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel and working people and school youth and children.
					
					 Laid before the statue and grave were wreaths in the name of the C.C., the WPK, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 Also placed there were wreaths in the name of working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, KPA units, educational, public health and media institutions and party and power organs, enterprises, farms, etc. in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Hyong Jik, looking back on his revolutionary life and exploits.
					
					 Floral tribute was paid to his statues at Kim Hyong Jik Military Medical University and in Sakju County, North Phyongan Province and Junggang County, Jagang Province on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Hyong Jik's Feats for Korean Revolution
articles.content:
Kim Hyong Jik's Feats for Korean Revolution
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Hyong Jik, father of President Kim Il Sung, was not only an indomitable revolutionary of Korea but also a great teacher as he contributed to the growth of his son into a prominent and popular leader.
					 He had worked heart and soul to bring up Kim Il Sung to be a son of Korea fully ready to save the nation from Japan's colonial rule.
					
					 Frequently telling the history of Korean people's anti-Japanese struggles, the father led his son to have high ambitions for the country. And he taught the son Korean alphabet, geography and history and other knowledge and guided his reading systematically.
					
					 He let 12-year old Kim Il Sung go single-handed to Mangyongdae in Korea from Badaogou in China, the course of which covers 250 miles, saying that he must know well about the homeland in order to achieve its independence.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik handed down to his son the idea of Aim High, the idea of being prepared for three contingencies--a revolutionary must be prepared for death from hunger, death from beating and death from the cold--, the idea of recruiting comrades and two pistols as the precious heritage.
					
					 Thanks to his education and edification, Kim Il Sung grew into a prominent leader of the Korean nation and accomplished the cause of national liberation.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Great Man Always Living in Hearts of World Progressives
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Great Man Always Living in Hearts of World Progressives
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime had shown deep loving care for many party leaders, heads of state and personages of different countries.
					 When former Yugoslav President Tito passed away, Kim Il Sung personally went to Belgrade and warmly consoled the bereaved family members and the Yugoslav people. 
					
					 Thanks to Kim Il Sung's comradeship and support, former Palestinian President Yasser Arafat, who was living in exile, could rise to fame as an Arab hero.
					
					 Kim Il Sung called Che Guevara his revolutionary comrade and, after his heroic death on the battlefield, published a famous work to the memory of his revolutionary life.
					
					 He also encouraged presidents of African countries in their struggle for achieving national liberation and building a new society. Among them were former Mozambican President Samora Moises Machel and former Namibian President Sam Nujoma.
					
					 Kim Il Sung had always valued the friendly relations with Otto Grotewohl, former chairman of the Council of Ministers of East Germany, and bestowed benevolence upon the bereaved family after his death. 
					
					 He praised former Chilean President Salvador Allende Gossens, whom he met once, as a revolutionary and a hero for waging an unyielding struggle for his political faith. 
					
					 He put forward Martyr Zhang Weihua of China and Nobichenko, a former officer of the Soviet army, as models of internationalists and took warm care of their families.
					
					 Fidel Castro Ruz, former president of the Council of State of Cuba, recalled with deep emotion that he would never forget the solidarity and support rendered by Kim Il Sung to the Cuban revolution and people.
					
					 Among those who were deeply moved by the great personality of Kim Il Sung were former Portuguese President Francisco Da Costa Gomes, former French President Francois Mitterrand, former U.S. President Jimmy Carter, former Vice-Prime Minister of Japan Sin Kanemaru, a U.S. religionist Billy Graham and others.

articles.title: Aim High, Kim Hyong Jik's Lifelong Motto
articles.content:
Aim High, Kim Hyong Jik's Lifelong Motto
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- An increasing number of people are visiting the statues of Kim Hyong Jik in different parts of the DPRK to pay tribute to him on the occasion of his 120th birthday. 
					 Kim Hyong Jik, who was born into a patriotic family in Mangyongdae on July 10, 1894, was an outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea.
					
					 He devoted himself to achieving Korea's independence, regarding the idea of Aim High as his lifelong creed.
					
					 The idea of Aim High represents the revolutionary outlook on life which calls for finding true worth and happiness in the struggle for the country and nation and the indomitable revolutionary spirit that Korea's independence should be achieved by the Korean people at any cost by waging a struggle generation after generation. 
					
					 He went round Jiandao area, Shanghai and other areas of China as well as many areas of the homeland in order to rally comrades and lay mass foundations of achieving national independence.
					
					 On March 23, Juche 6 (1917), he formed the Korean National Association, an anti-Japanese underground revolutionary organization.
					
					 On the basis of making a detailed analysis of situation at home and abroad and the lesson drawn from the March First Popular Uprising, he convened the Chongsudong Meeting in July 1919, at which he underscored the necessity of the proletarian revolution for the independence of the country.
					
					 He convened the Kuandian Meeting in August that year to set forth the policy of changing the course of independence struggle from the nationalist movement into the proletarian revolution.
					
					 Keeping the idea of Aim High deep in his mind, President Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea.  And under the banner of the Juche idea he led the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and thus achieved the country's liberation and successfully built up the Korean-style socialism centered on popular masses.
					
					 The idea of Aim High created by Kim Hyong Jik has served as a permanent ideological and mental legacy promoting the victorious advance of the Korean revolution.

articles.title: DPRK's Sports Achievements for Past 20 Years
articles.content:
DPRK's Sports Achievements for Past 20 Years
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- It is the instruction of President Kim Il Sung that the DPRK athletes should prove successful in international tournaments to display the dignity of the country.
					 True to his instruction, athletes of the DPRK have won more than 1 400 gold medals in international tournaments, including Olympic Games and world championships, for the last two decades.
					
					 Those of the Korean People's Army hoisted the DPRK flag 11 times at the First Military World Games held in Rome in September Juche 84 (1995).
					
					 Judoist Kye Sun Hui defeated her Japanese rival to bag a gold medal in the 26th Atlanta Olympiad on July 27, 1996, thus flying the DPRK flag in the United States to delight the people in the homeland celebrating the war victory day.
					
					 Jong Song Ok breasted the tape in the women's marathon of the 7th World Track and Field Championships in August 1999 to show the true picture of Songun (military-first) Korea whose people are rallied as one in mind around their leader.
					
					 The DPRK bagged 60 gold medals in 2001, 88 in 2002 and more than 90 in 2008.
					
					 Its Taekwon-do players snatched nearly 500 gold medals in various international tournaments, including the World Taekwon-Do Championships and the International Martial Arts Games.
					
					 In 2012 the DPRK sportspersons proved successful in the London Olympic Games and international tournaments held in China, Myanmar, Kyrgyzstan, Sweden, Poland and other countries.
					
					 Last year alone, they won 185 gold medals in such sporting events as judo, weightlifting, wrestling, table-tennis, marathon, boxing, speed skating, diving and gymnastics.

articles.title: Arch Criminal Violating UN Resolutions
articles.content:
Arch Criminal Violating UN Resolutions
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is chiefly responsible for checking the implementation of UN resolutions in the Korean peninsula.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Ri Kyong Chol, a section chief of the Law Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The U.S. is raising a hue and cry over the DPRK's recent tactical guided missile test-fire, branding it as a "threat escalating tension in the region."
					
					 The U.S. and its followers have frequently abused UN "resolutions" against the legitimate sovereign rights of the DPRK whenever an opportunity presents itself. In particular, the UNSC resolutions Nos. 1718 and 1874 are a product of high-handedness, a culmination of illegality cooked up by them in disregard of the universal international laws. That is why the DPRK has never recognized the legitimacy of those resolutions.
					
					 It has been nearly 40 years since the UN resolution on the withdrawal of all foreign troops from south Korea was adopted at the 30th session of the UN General Assembly.
					
					 At that time, 43 member states of the UN presented a joint resolution on the issue of Korea to the General Assembly, which calls for dissolving the "UN Command" in south Korea, withdrawing all foreign troops from south Korea, replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace agreement and taking practical measures to ease tension between the north and the south of Korea and ensure stable peace. And if the resolution was fully implemented, the situation would not have aggravated in the region with the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula already settled.
					
					 This fact alone goes to prove that the U.S. is the enemy of global peace, who has made a mockery of the UN.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are not qualified for talking about UN resolutions.
					
					 Now what remains to be done by the U.S. and its followers is to just keep watching the measures to be taken by the DPRK to bolster its capability for self-defence.

articles.title: Seminar in DPRK Marks World Population Day
articles.content:
Seminar in DPRK Marks World Population Day
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the theme "Investing in Young People" was held here today to mark World Population Day (July 11). 
					 Present there were officials concerned and representatives of the UN Population Fund and other international agencies here.
					
					 The seminar dealt with the young population in the DPRK and its development, understanding and approach to reproductive health among the young people, the targets to be hit for settling the issue of youths after 2015 in the Asia-Pacific region, etc.
					
					 In this regard, Yang Song Il, a section chief of the Population Centre of the DPRK told KCNA:
					
					 The DPRK has paid deep attention to improving the education and health of young people.
					
					 Over the last five years, it worked out a policy on the universal 12-year compulsory education, amended the law on general education and adopted the laws on women's rights, children's rights and labor protection, thus laying legal ground for the education and rights of young people.
					
					 The DPRK celebrated the birthday of the Korean Children's Union (June 6) and the Youth Day (August 28) in a splendid way so as to create an atmosphere for loving the young people. And it enhanced the supervisory role of the judicial organs against assault and maltreatment of the young people.
					
					 The DPRK government included the issue of health for the young people in its 2011-2015 state reproductive health strategy and 2010-2015 mid-term strategic plan for development of public health, in order to ensure high-level health service for them.
					
					 It will further improve the education and health service for the young, implement the ICPD (International Conference on Population & Development) action program, the Beijing action declaration and the ICPD Basic Activities to be done after 1999 and strengthen cooperation with the UN Population Fund and other international bodies. 
					
					 Meanwhile, media of the DPRK dedicated articles and programs to World Population Day and the Population Centre issued Population Newsletter.
					
					 A similar seminar is to be held in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province of the country on July 15.

articles.title: Presentation of Sci-Technological Successes Held
articles.content:
Presentation of Sci-Technological Successes Held
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A presentation of scientific and technological successes was held here on July 9 and 10 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Branch Academy of Light Industrial Science of the State Academy of Sciences. It was sponsored by the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 It was held, divided into textile, foodstuff, daily necessities and machine and information panels. Presented there were more than 330 papers on the achievements made in the field of light industry in recent years in hearty response to the idea of the Workers' Party of Korea on attaching importance to science.
					
					 Exhibited there were at least 60 scientific and technological data and products, diagrams and multi-media.
					
					 The participants introduced the achievements and experience gained in keeping production going at a high rate, increasing the proportion of locally available raw and other materials, putting equipment and production processes on a modern and CNC basis and developing new goods.
					
					 Present at the presentation were officials concerned, officials, scientists, technicians, teachers, researchers, members of three-revolution teams and post-graduate students of scientific and educational institutions and production units in the field of light industry.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying Idea of Jiwon (Aim High)
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying Idea of Jiwon (Aim High)
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday dedicates an editorial to the 120th anniversary of birth of indomitable revolutionary fighter Kim Hyong Jik.
					 Calling on all party members, service personnel and other people to dynamically struggle for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a thriving nation, always cherishing the idea of Jiwon (aim high), the editorial notes:
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik, who was born into a patriotic family of Mangyongdae on July 10, 1894, was an outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea who set forth the idea of Jiwon in the dark days under the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists over Korea and ushered in a new history of switching from the nationalist movement to the proletarian movement.
					
					 The idea of Jiwon serves as an ideological and mental motive power for the steady advance of the Korean revolution.
					
					 It represents the revolutionary outlook on life that finds true worth and happiness in the struggle for the country and the nation, and an indomitable revolutionary spirit calling for liberating the country at any cost by fighting against the Japanese imperialists generation after generation.
					
					 True to his noble idea, President Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of the revolution in his early years, defeated the gangster-like Japanese imperialists, accomplished the historic cause of national liberation and built most advantageous Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					 The valuable legacy, the idea of Jiwon, could shed its brighter rays thanks to leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The idea is still given a steady continuity in the new century of Juche.
					
					 It is an eternal treasure of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea and a banner of struggle that should be upheld forever.

articles.title: Institution of Special Law on Probing Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Called for
articles.content:
Institution of Special Law on Probing Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Called for
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee of the Families of Victims, Missing Persons and Survivors of the Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on July 7 at which it demanded the authorities institute a special law on thoroughly probing the truth about the ferry disaster.
					 The organization held that the special bill on the ferry Sewol disaster proposed by the "Saenuri Party," etc. can hardly help conduct a probe into the truth about the accident.
					
					 What the families of the victims want is a special law for making a thorough probe into the truth and building a safe society, it noted, adding: Accordingly, the measure committee has worked out the April 16 special bill.
					
					 It declared it would submit to the "National Assembly" the April 16 special bill signed by three million people up to now and launch actions to institute the law.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Calls for Doing Best to Probe Truth behind Ferry Sinking Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Calls for Doing Best to Probe Truth behind Ferry Sinking Disaster
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on July 4 demanded the authorities do best to probe the truth behind the ferry Sewol sinking disaster.
					 The editorial said that the state investigation to probe the truth behind the ferry sinking disaster was suspended on July 2.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" took such action, taking issue with the remarks made by a lawmaker from an opposition party who called for information related to the present chief executive. 
					
					 The editorial called upon the people to make utmost efforts so that the truth behind the incident may be probed without fail and the issues that can be solved be settled even now.

articles.title: Probe into Truth about IS's Fabrication of Spy Case Demanded by S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
Probe into Truth about IS's Fabrication of Spy Case Demanded by S. Korean Paper
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A south Korean who faked up evidence at the instigation of the Intelligence Service (IS) sent a letter of apology to the victim of the spy case of public official in Seoul City some days ago.
					 In the letter he confessed that he cooked up evidence with a foolish idea of helping the IS and the prosecution driven into a tight corner.
					
					 The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on July 7 carried an editorial in this regard.
					
					 The editorial held that the truth about the IS's fabrication of the spy case should be clearly probed and those responsible for it should face a legal action at an open trial.
					
					 If the spy case is glossed over, it will surely repeat itself, the editorial noted.

articles.title: Remembrance Event Held at Korean University of Chongryon
articles.content:
Remembrance Event Held at Korean University of Chongryon
Tokyo, July 9 (KNS-KCNA) -- An event of yearning, loyalty and pledge "The sun of Juche will be eternal" was held at the hall of Korean University of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on July 7 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were teachers and students of the university.
					
					 The performers impressively presented narrations, songs, poem recitals, dances, etc. to praise the immortal exploits performed by the President for the country and its people.
					
					 The audience was mesmerized by the performance as it reflected ardent yearning and profound reverence for Kim Il Sung, a peerless patriot, who brought a bright future to the land of the country with rays of the sun and ushered in a new era of national independence and laid an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country.
					
					 All the teachers and students renewed the pledge of loyalty to hold the President in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche and take the lead in ushering in a new heyday in the movement of Koreans in Japan as required by the glorious era of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Elder Statesman Highly Praised by Foreign Heads of State and Politicians
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Elder Statesman Highly Praised by Foreign Heads of State and Politicians
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was highly praised by foreign heads of state and prominent figures as a veteran statesman.
					 I. V. Stalin, head of the former Soviet Union, said Kim Il Sung was a genuine proletarian internationalist, who defended the Soviet Union with arms and at the cost of blood, and a paragon of communist.
					
					 Former Yugoslav President Tito said the non-aligned policy pursued by Kim Il Sung served as a model in the development of the non-aligned movement and he was a great and outstanding leader playing a big role in advancing the non-aligned movement and the international communist movements. 
					
					 Former Vietnamese President Ho Chi Minh said he always regarded himself as a disciple of Kim Il Sung though he was senior to Kim Il Sung in the revolutionary struggle.
					
					 Former Cuban President of the Council of State Fidel Castro said Kim Il Sung was the most experienced and prestigious politician among heads of state in the world.
					
					 Former French President Mitterrand praised Kim Il Sung as a great head of state, saying that Kim Il Sung was the greatest man who had been active since the end of the Second World War. He added that he was the only one among the G-7 leaders, who was blessed with having opportunity to meet him, and it was a great honor.
					
					 Sin Kanemaru, former vice-president of the Liberal-Democratic Party of Japan, said he earnestly respected Kim Il Sung as a great statesman and would always stand by the DPRK.
					
					 He expressed his determination to entrust himself to Kim Il Sung in the efforts for achieving peace.

articles.title: Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse Visited by Indonesian People
articles.content:
Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse Visited by Indonesian People
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of visiting the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse took place in Indonesia on July 3 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Exhibited at the greenhouse were more than 100 potted Kimilsungias in full bloom.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were personages of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, a flower garden council in Jakarta, a university of Indonesia, the Council for Jakarta Orchid Park of Indonesia and the Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange and masses.
					
					 Before the visit, the participants were briefed on the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and how Kimilsungia came into being and several personages made speeches.
					
					 The general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia said:
					
					 There are many great persons in the world but I have not seen flowers named after the great persons.
					
					 The undying feats performed by the President in accomplishing the human cause of independence will be everlasting along with Kimilsungia, the flower of the sun.
					
					 Kimilsungia is the flower symbolic of the friendly relations between Indonesia and the DPRK.
					
					 I hope that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany in an article posted on its website on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung said the world progressives are praising the President as the eternal sun. 
					 The article continued:
					
					 The august name of Kim Il Sung means the sun.
					
					 The President indicated the road to be followed by the nation with the bright rays of the sun, built the flower garden of love for people with its warmth and attracted all people with great charisma.
					
					 The President founded the Juche idea, indicating the road to be followed not only by the Korean people but by mankind.
					
					 The founding of this great idea ushered in the era of independence in which the working masses who had been subject to exploitation and oppression after being pushed outside history in the past emerge the master of history.
					
					 The President, possessed of immensely broad magnanimity and the noble sense of international obligation, rendered material and moral assistance to the national liberation struggle, the anti-imperialist struggle and the building of new society in many countries including African countries.
					
					 Though he passed away, his idea and cause will always remain shining just as the sun is eternal.
					
					 The north made sure that the President lies in state at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and is holding him in high esteem as the eternal leader.
					
					 He is steadily presented with orders, medals, honorary titles and gifts by heads of state and people of different social standings of many countries and international organizations even after his demise.
					
					 On the occasion of the Day of the Sun, there take place grand events including Kimilsungia Festival and the April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					
					 The President is always alive in the hearts of mankind as the eternal sun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Mongolian and Indonesian Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Mongolian and Indonesian Newspapers
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Mongolian and Indonesian newspapers dedicated special write-ups to the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The 25th issue of the Mongolian newspaper Khodolmor carried a special article titled "Great programme for national reunification" accompanied with a portrait of the smiling President and his photos.
					
					 It praised the President as the great man who devoted his whole life to reunifying the country divided by foreign forces.
					
					 It said that the three principles of national reunification, ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo set forth by the President are the three charters for national reunification to be firmly adhered to in reunifying Korea.
					
					 The Indonesian newspaper International Media on July 2 allotted one whole page to a special write-up illustrated with the portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 It in an article titled "Kim Il Sung and his benevolent image" referred to the fact that he kindly treated not only the Korean people but the south Korean people, overseas compatriots and foreign friends with bright smile on his face and all people admired his noble traits.
					
					 The Indonesian newspaper Suara Karya on June 26 in an article titled "President Kim Il Sung who is alive forever" said that the President is immortal for his prominent personality as the great man.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Carried by Mongolian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Carried by Mongolian Newspaper
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" was carried by the June 25th issue of the Mongolian newspaper Khodolmor. 
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 82 (1993), deals with the issues of founding a reunified state through the unity of the whole nation, getting united in the spirit of patriotism and national independence, promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests and putting an end to all political disputes that foment division and confrontation between fellow countrymen.
					
					 It also comprehensively clarifies the ways of achieving the great national unity including the issues for the north and the south to build confidence and achieve unity and join hands in the road for national reunification without rejecting each other because of differing isms. 
					
					 The newspaper carried the portrait of the smiling President and his photo.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Figures of Slovenia, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Figures of Slovenia, Nigeria
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Figures of Slovenia and Nigeria issued statements on July 1 and 3 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Igor Jurisic, chairman of the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association, said that though the President passed away, progressive humankind is highly praising him as the eternal sun of Juche. He went on:
					
					 The popular masses could independently and creatively pioneer the times and history as the master of the world and their own destiny as the President founded the Juche idea.
					
					 The President defeated the Japanese imperialists and realized the liberation of Korea by force of arms, accomplished the cause of building the party, army and state and firmly defended the country's sovereignty from the invasion by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist country by wisely leading the struggle for the postwar rehabilitation and construction and socialist revolution and construction.
					
					 Ibrahim Mantu, chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, said:
					
					 Not only the Korean people but the world progressive people are solemnly looking back upon the great career and immortal exploits of the President on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, the father of socialist Korea, is the prominent leader and peerless great man who embarked upon the road of the revolution in his teens and devoted his all to the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence till the advanced age of 80.
					
					 He will always be alive in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressive people as the sun of Juche and humankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Posted by Austrian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Posted by Austrian Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was posted by the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK on its website on July 4.
					 The website carried the portrait of the smiling President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Mexican Political Party Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Mexican Political Party Figures
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting and an opening ceremony of the Korean photo, book and handicraft exhibition were held by the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico and a lecture by the Workers' Party of Mexico on July 1 and 2 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venues of events were photos documenting the exploits of the President.
					
					 Also on display there were works of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, photos and books introducing Songun Korea and handicraft works associated with the wisdom and talent of the Korean people.
					
					 Cuautemoc Amezcua Dromundo, chairman of the Central Committee of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, said that the President achieved the country's liberation through the armed struggle against the Japanese imperialists and beat back the invasion by the U.S. imperialists and forces following them, firmly defending the country's independence and sovereignty.
					
					 He praised the President as the father of the Korean nation and the founder of socialist Korea who turned the DPRK into a socialist power centred on the popular masses by wisely leading the social revolutions of several stages.
					
					 A member of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico in his lecture said:
					
					 The President is the great politician who founded the Juche idea, the guiding idea in the era of independence, and thoroughly applied it to the Korean revolution.
					
					 His smile like the sun is filled with the truest love for human being and distinguished humanity.
					
					 The world prominent figures who had the honor of being received by the President highly praised him, fascinated by his personality.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Round-table talks were held at the General Metal and Machine Company and the Enterprise for Water Project Designing and Control in Ethiopia, a reading session at construction site No. 1 in a district, Conakry City, Guinea and a photo and book exhibition in Kuala Lumpur of Malaysia in the period from July 1 to 3. 
					
					 On display at the venue of the photo and book exhibition were photos documenting the exploits of Kim Il Sung and Marshal Kim Jong Un. Also displayed there were works of the Marshal and photos and books introducing Songun Korea. 
					
					 Present at the events were personages of different social standings and other masses in relevant countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on July 2. 
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives.
					
					 It also clarifies the tasks to firmly defend their ideas and feats and add eternal brilliance to them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige entrenamiento de lanzamiento de cohetes tacticos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige entrenamiento de lanzamiento de cohetes tacticos
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, volvio a dirigir en el terreno el entrenamiento de lanzamiento de cohetes tacticos de las unidades de ataque del frente occidental de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC.
					El entrenamiento fue realizado combinando el movimiento inesperado con el ataque de fuego, para calificar y revisar la capacidad del combate real de las unidades de ataque del frente occidental de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC.
					
					El Comandante Supremo averiguo en detalles en el terreno el plan de lanzamiento elaborado por el Estado Mayor de las fuerzas estrategicas, la orbita de vuelo y el estado de bloque de las aguas de impacto y dio la orden de lanzamiento de cohetes tacticos.
					
					A traves del presente entrenamiento, se manifesto de nuevo la efectividad y el poderio combativo de nuestros cohetes tacticos, fueron determinados claramente el orden del movimiento combativo y la mision de fuego en el caso de emergencia de las unidades de ataque del frente occidental y fue completado el metodo de tiro a distintos blancos enemigos.
					
					El Comandante Supremo expreso gran satisfaccion de que el entrenamiento fue realizado con exito al combinar con el movimiento rapido conforme a la demanda de la guerra moderna.
					
					Y dio instrucciones programaticas para completar los preparativos combativos de las fuerzas estrategicas y aplicar el autoctono metodo de combate de cohetes.
					
					Debemos prepararnos en lo dicho y lo hecho. Si no tenemos las fuerzas, seremos victimas de regateo de las potencias y nuestra historia preciosa perdera su brillo en un momento, aunque somos honestos y justos, subrayo el Mariscal.
					
					El Comandante Supremo expreso gran esperanza y conviccion de que las unidades de las fuerzas estrategicas fortaleceran mas en adelante tambien los preparativos de combate de la rama de cohetes mediante los entrenamientos como combate verdadero de hoy y mantendran constantemente el estado de alerta de lanzamiento inmediato para mantener a rayas con el poderoso disuasivo militar, las imprudentes locuras conflictivas de los enemigos encaminadas a sofocarnos  a toda costa con las fuerzas.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un fue acompanado por Hwang Pyong So, Pak Jong Chon, Yun Tong Hyon y Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un expresa condolencias ante el feretro de difunto Jon Pyong Ho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un expresa condolencias ante el feretro de difunto Jon Pyong Ho
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el dia 9 el feretro del difunto Jon Pyong Ho y expreso profundas condolencias por su deceso.
					Al pie del feretro estaban colocadas una ofrenda floral enviada por el Mariscal y las otras en nombre del Comite Central del PTC, la Comision Militar Central del PTC, el CDN de la RPDC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares y otros organos.
					
					El feretro estuvo flanqueado por los guardias de honor del EPC.
					
					El Mariscal guardo un momento de silencio en memoria del fallecido y dio una vuelta a su feretro con el gran dolor por haber perdido al revolucionario veterano quien hasta el ultimo momento de su vida, dedico todo lo suyo para glorificar las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, acumuladas en la rama de industria para la defensa nacional.
					
					Luego, expreso profundo pesar a los familiares del difunto dandoles consuelo con palabras cordiales.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta visita de condolencias Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, Hyon Yong Chol, Pak To Chun, Yun Tong Hyon, Jo Chun Ryong, Ju Kyu Chang y Choe Chun Sik.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de difunto Jon Pyong Ho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de difunto Jon Pyong Ho
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 9 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Jon Pyong Ho, general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del Ejercito Popular de Corea y director honorario del Museo de Armas del EPC, en senal de profundas condolencias por su deceso.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de Zyuganov
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de Zyuganov
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje que le enviara el dia 8 el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de la Federacion Rusa, G. Zyuganov.
					El texto senala: 
					
					Estimado camarada Kim Jong Un, 
					
					Pasaron 20 anos desde cuando fallecio el camarada Kim Il Sung, gran hijo del pueblo coreano. 
					
					El camarada Kim Il Sung es el fundador del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y sus fuerzas armadas. 
					
					El realizo nobles proezas en construir un Estado moderno y alcanzar exitos en todas las esferas de vida de la RPDC incluso la industria, la salud publica, la ciencia, la educacion y los deportes. 
					
					El camarada Kim Il Sung presento los historicos proyectos para la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de la patria.
					
					Hoy dia, el pueblo coreano rinde el homenaje al lider con trabajos heroicos. 
					
					Estamos convencidos de que el pueblo de la RPDC seguira con exito la construccion de la sociedad socialista en acato al legado del camarada Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Con alta consideracion.

articles.title: Presidente de Comite Olimpico envia aviso al titular del comite organizador de Juegos Asiaticos
articles.content:
Presidente de Comite Olimpico envia aviso al titular del comite organizador de Juegos Asiaticos
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Comite Olimpico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea remitio el dia 10 un aviso al presidente del comite organizador de los XVII Juegos Asiaticos.
					Como se ha manifestado en la reciente declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC, se decidio enviar a los XVII Juegos Asiaticos, que tendran lugar en Inchon del Sur de Corea, la seleccion nacional y un nutrido grupo de hinchas de la RPDC con el fin de mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas, fomentar el ambiente de unidad nacional y elevar la moral de los jugadores, recuerda el mensaje.
					
					Propone sostener alrededor del 15 de julio en la parte nortena o la surena de Phanmunjom las conversaciones de trabajo Norte-Sur de los funcionarios competentes para consultar todos los problemas que se presentan en la participacion de la seleccion de la RPDC en la referida cita deportiva y en el envio del grupo de hinchas.

articles.title: En Pyongyang delegacion de parlamentarios japoneses
articles.content:
En Pyongyang delegacion de parlamentarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ACNC) -- Arribo el dia 10 a esta capital la delegacion de los parlamentarios japoneses encabezada por el senador Kanji Inoki.
					La delegacion esta integrada por los representantes de la Dieta Kenta Matsunami, Takashi Ishizeki y Naoto Sakaguchi y los senadores  Takayuki Shimizu y Taro Yamada quienes pertenecen  a varios partidos politicos de Japon y otros acompanantes, miembros de la Asociacion de comunidad de deportes y paz de Japon.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita dia de triunfo de revolucion popular de Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita dia de triunfo de revolucion popular de Mongolia
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 10 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de Mongolia, Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj, con motivo del 93o aniversario del triunfo de la revolucion popular de Mongolia. 
					La misiva expresa la conviccion de que las tradicionales y excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran cada dia mas por los ingentes esfuerzos conjuntos y desea mayor progreso y prosperidad al amistoso pueblo mongol.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con embajador brasileno
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con embajador brasileno
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ACNC) -- El canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Su Yong, departio el dia 10 con el embajador de la Republica Federativa del Brasil en Corea, Roberto Colin, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Celebran Dia Mundial de Poblacion en RPDC
articles.content:
Celebran Dia Mundial de Poblacion en RPDC
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia Mundial de Poblacion (11 de julio), tuvo lugar hoy en esta capital un seminario.
					El Fondo de Poblacion de la ONU presento como tema de este ano "Invertir en la poblacion juvenil".
					
					En el foro estuvieron presentes los funcionarios de las ramas interesados del pais y los representantes de organizaciones internacionales en Corea, inclusive el Fondo de Poblacion de la ONU.
					
					Quedaron publicados varios asuntos tales como el estado de poblacion juvenil de Corea y sus perspectivas, la concepcion y la actitud de la juventud sobre la salud reproductiva y la meta a ser alcanzada para la solucion del problema de la juventud en la region de Asia-Pacifico despues de 2015.
					
					Despierta interes en Corea el llamamiento del Fondo de la Poblacion de la ONU emitido a los jovenes para que reciban la educacion de nivel mas alto, se incorporen a la sociedad con buena salud y pongan en pleno juego sus capacidades.
					
					El jefe de seccion del Instituto de Poblacion, Yang Song Il, dijo a la ACNC como sigue:
					
					En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se presta mucha atencion a la educacion y la proteccion de salud de jovenes y ninos que se presentan como asuntos delicados en escala mundial.
					
					Durante los ultimos 5 anos, en la RPDC fue trazada la politica sobre la ensenanza obligatoria general de 12 anos, enmendado y complementado el metodo de ensenaza general y quedaron aprobadas nuevamente la ley de derechos de la mujer, la de derechos de infantes, la de proteccion de trabajo y otras. De esta manera, se ha sentado la base legal de la educacion y la proteccion de derechos de los jovenes.
					
					Se celebraron en gran dimension el dia de la fundacion de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea (6 de junio) y el Dia de la Juventud (28 de agosto).
					
					Asi se creo el ambiente social de amar a los jovenes y se prohiben por la ley la violacion y el maltrato a ellos, ademas de elevar el papel supervisor de los organos judiciales sobre el respecto.
					
					La salud de jovenes y ninos se ha incluido en la estrategia estatal de salud reproductiva 2011-2015 y el plan de estrategia a medio plazo para el desarrollo de salud publica 2010-2015, ya aprobados.
					
					En el futuro tambien, intensificaremos y mejoraremos la ensenanza y la salud publica para los jovenes, ejecutaremos el programa de accion ICPD, la declaracion de accion de Beijing, las actividades basicas de ICPD despues de 1999, etc. y estrecharemos la cooperacion con las organizaciones internacionales, inclusive el Fondo de Poblacion de la ONU.
					
					Por otra parte, se desarrollaron diversas actividades de propaganda sobre el Dia Mundial de Poblacion mientras el Instituto de la Poblacion publico la edicion especial del periodico "Noticias sobre la poblacion".
					
					El dia 15, se efectuara el seminario con el mismo tema en la ciudad de Hamhung de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.

articles.title: EE.UU. es violador de resoluciones de ONU
articles.content:
EE.UU. es violador de resoluciones de ONU
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ACNC) -- EE.UU. es el autor que viola las resoluciones de la ONU en la Peninsula Coreana.
					Asi dijo a un reportero de la ACNC Ri Kyong Chol, jefe de seccion del Instituto de Justicia de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales y continuo: 
					
					EE.UU. cuestiona el lanzamiento de prueba y el entrenamiento de lanzamiento de proyectiles teledirigidos tacticos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como "acto amenazante que aumenta la tension de la region". 
					
					EE.UU. y sus satelites suelen hablar de las "resoluciones" de la ONU que prohiben el ejercicio de derecho independiente de la RPDC. 
					
					Las resoluciones no. 1718 y no. 1874 del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU son productos de ilegalidad y despotismo que desprecian hasta los derechos internacionales universales superiores que las resoluciones de la ONU, razon por la cual no las hemos reconocido ninguna vez. 
					
					Preguntamos a los que santifican tanto las resoluciones de la ONU. ?Como ustedes trataron la resolucion de la ONU sobre la retirada de todos los ejercitos extranjeros del suelo surcoreano, aprobada ya hace cerca de 40 anos en el 30o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU?
					
					El proyecto de resolucion conjunta de 43 paises miembros de la ONU sobre el problema coreano, aprobado en aquel entonces, demanda tomar las medidas practicas para desmantelar la "comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU", retirar todos los ejercitos extranjeros estacionados en el suelo surcoreano, sustituir el Acuerdo de Armisticio por el convenio de paz, aliviar la tension entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea y preservar la paz duradera. 
					
					Si se hubiera cumplido esta resolucion, la situacion regional no estaria tan tensa como ahora y ya se habria resuelto el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					La historia revela que EE.UU. es el enemigo de la paz mundial que abusa de la ONU y desprecia las voces de justicia de la sociedad humana. 
					
					EE.UU. demostro a todo el mundo su verdadera naturaleza de gangster con sus actos arrogantes e insolentes en cuanto al lanzamiento de proyectiles teledirigidos tacticos de la RPDC. 
					
					Seria mejor que EE.UU. y sus seguidores se hallen sin decir nada y vean con la boca cerrada las medidas de fortalecimiento de las fuerzas de autodefensa nacional de la RPDC.
